thread.section_title: Fertel Maillot - UPDATED 2017 Hotel Reviews & Price Comparison (Paris, France) - TripAdvisor
thread.title: Over prized 3 star hotel
thread.title_full: Over prized 3 star hotel - Review of Fertel Maillot, Paris, France - TripAdvisor

author: Maya_Travel_Director
title: Over prized 3 star hotel
text:
I had to stay at this hotel for business reasons. Be aware that on week-ends the breakfast is only continental, but the breakfast costs the same as the full breakfast during the week! My room and bathroom was clean. Both are only maximum 3 star category. The door to the balcony had been left open in the room all day, so it was freezing when I got to check into my room at 6 p.m. in the evening. I had to have the heating running on 25C all night to be able to sleep. There is no locked luggage room. The hotel lets you put your luggage on the side of the hotel staircase, that is located behind an unlocked door.
Room Tip: Higher floors are quieter from the street located infront of the hotel. See more room tips
